name: MemoryPing.ai

param.problem: Generic reminder bots lack context awareness.
param.solution: Hybrid NLP Router (Regex + Scikit-Learn) with vector embeddings.
param.impact: Intelligent Telegram bot serving as a 'Second Brain'.

content: A smart productivity bot using semantic search and Torch embeddings to understand user intent. It runs an active learning pipeline for self-improvement and gamification features for streak tracking.

name: Thulasi SaaS

param.problem: Tuition centers struggle with scheduling & billing.
param.impact: Full-Stack SaaS platform drastically reducing admin overhead via automated billing.

content: Comprehensive backoffice system for tuition centers. It features a custom Pandas vectorized scheduling algorithm for conflict prevention, Razorpay subscription billing, and a magic-link attendance tracking system.

name: Trading Platform

param.problem: Manual trading lacks concurrency control for multi-leg strategies.
param.solution: Event-driven architecture using Redis as a central message bus.
param.impact: Automated derivatives trading and risk management automation.

content: Distributed institution-grade trading platform capable of autonomous multi-leg option strategies via an event-driven Redis backend. Built with a custom OMS.

name: LaNÃ©a Gifting

param.solution: Zero-dependency Vanilla JS with custom 3D magnetic tilt.
param.impact: Premium boutique landing page with high-performance scroll fx.

content: A luxury gifting boutique website featuring custom parallax effects and a physics-based magnetic cursor.

name: Thulasi Web

param.problem: SaaS landing pages need to convert.
param.impact: High-aesthetic product page with texture overlays.

content: The public-facing landing page for Thulasi, designed to impress with a 3D particle vortex and grain textures.

name: MemoryPing Web

param.problem: AI assistants need gamified, engaging presentations.
param.solution: Vanilla HTML/JS with Web Audio API & Canvas Games.
param.impact: Premium, interactive landing page driving bot adoption.

content: A highly interactive landing page featuring neon glassmorphism, floating hologram heroes, intersection observers, and embedded canvas mini-games.

name: Pixel-OS Portfolio

param.solution: React/Vite SPA with custom 3D Canvas & GSAP Motion.

content: A premium personal portfolio with a 3D R3F particle swarm, framer-motion grids, Spline embeds, and intricate scroll-triggered micro-interactions.
